name: Spin Inc. - Prize Wheel Cash
description:
Spin Inc. is a brand new exciting tower building game, how high can you build? Heist collection items and cash from your friends and foes, but be careful as they can target you back.

SPIN INC. FEATURES

-Build your tower as tall as you want.
-100% FREE to play Game.
-Totally New game play for 2017
-COLLECT and Complete 10 collections with 50 different items.
-STEAL from your friends and others to make your tower bigger.
-EASY to learn and play
-Form Alliances to protect yourself
-Get REVENGE on people who stole from you.
-Compete in Global Events with your alliance to find out who is best.
-Complete goals and daily missions for rewards
-Compete on leaderboards to become the best spinner!

Ready to play the best FREE tower building game of 2017, download now and get started! There many floors to build and people to steal from in Spin Inc. FREE stuff every day to help build your tower taller than anyone else right now!
